sentences.sContent: The children ran naked through the yard.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们光着身子跑过院子。

sentences.sContent: a picture of a naked man
They found the body lying half naked in the grass.
sentences.sCn: 他们发现尸体半裸着躺在草丛中。

sentences.sContent: The governor ordered the prisoner to be stripped naked and whipped.
sentences.sCn: 监狱长下令将那个犯人剥光衣服进行鞭笞。

synos.tran: [生物]裸体的；无装饰的；无证据的；直率的

trans.tranOther: not wearing any clothes or not covered by clothes
